thread.title: Nadal routs Wawrinka 6-2, 6-1 to reach Shanghai semifinals
thread.title_full: Nadal routs Wawrinka 6-2, 6-1 to reach Shanghai semifinals

author: JUSTIN BERGMAN
title: Nadal routs Wawrinka 6-2, 6-1 to reach Shanghai semifinals
text:
Andy Wong Nadal routs Wawrinka 6-2, 6-1 to reach Shanghai semifinals 
Jo-Wilfried Tsonga of France celebrates after winning his quarterfinal match against Kevin Anderson of South Africa in the Shanghai Masters tennis tournament in Shanghai, China, Friday, Oct. 16, 2015. (AP Photo/Andy Wong) Andy Wong Nadal routs Wawrinka 6-2, 6-1 to reach Shanghai semifinals 
Jo-Wilfried Tsonga of France hits a return shot against Kevin Anderson of South Africa during their quarterfinal match of the Shanghai Masters tennis tournament in Shanghai, China, Friday, Oct. 16, 2015. (AP Photo/Andy Wong) Andy Wong Nadal routs Wawrinka 6-2, 6-1 to reach Shanghai semifinals 
Jo-Wilfried Tsonga of France reaches for the ball as he plays against Kevin Anderson of South Africa during their quarterfinal match of the Shanghai Masters tennis tournament in Shanghai, China, Friday, Oct. 16, 2015. (AP Photo/Andy Wong) Posted: Friday, October 16, 2015 3:13 am | Updated: 5:02 am, Fri Oct 16, 2015. Nadal routs Wawrinka 6-2, 6-1 to reach Shanghai semifinals Associated Press | 
SHANGHAI (AP) â€” Rafael Nadal beat a top-five player for the first time in more than a year by defeating Stan Wawrinka 6-2, 6-1 Friday to reach the semifinals of the Shanghai Masters. 
The fourth-seeded Wawrinka missed wildly on his groundstrokes throughout the match, finishing with 34 unforced errors. He was coming off a tough three-set victory over Marin Cilic in the quarterfinals that finished close to midnight the night before.
